=== Contributions ===
* Help Malaysian Team in Launchpad translating Ubuntu to Malay language (2007-2008)<<BR>><<BR>>
* By the end of August 2008, I founded Jom Linux which is a team consist of my members that want to help promoting Ubuntu. <<BR>><<BR>>
* In the early establishment of Jom Linux, we only help people in Linux especially Ubuntu via our official web site : http://www.jomlinux.com <<BR>><<BR>>
* Then, I set a new direction for Jom Linux to go further by creating Ubuntu 8.10 Kit which include a manual book to setup Ubuntu, stickers 'Powered by Ubuntu' and CD. For more information please go to this page (written in Malay) : http://kedai.jomlinux.com <<BR>><<BR>>
* Not only that, by the end of February and early of March 2009, we went to UiTM Perlis, a local university and opened a booth for Karnival Ilmu. We exhibited a demo and gave explanation about Ubuntu as well. To view the picture for this event please go to this link : http://picasaweb.google.com/jomlinux/ProjekKayanganUiTMPerlis# <<BR>><<BR>>
* Jom Linux also produced several documentaries and tutorial videos about Ubuntu. You can watch it by reviewing this URL: http://youtube.com/jomlinux <<BR>><<BR>>
* We also has changed Parliament Ampang's Office desktop, laptop and server to Ubuntu. <<BR>><<BR>>
* Jom Linux has been interviewed by OpenMalaysiaBlog because of these contributions. Link : http://www.openmalaysiablog.com/2009/03/ubuntu-usage-in-ampang-parliament-office.html <<BR>><<BR>>
* Even we are only 7 months old this month, we have done so many projects and activities that impresses our local community and Ubuntu. <<BR>>
